practice_phrases: With you
和你一起
Go with you
和你一起去
I want to travel with you
我想和你一起旅行
She wanted to travel with you
她想和你一起旅行
I asked if he wanted to go with you
我问他是否想和你一起去
Did you ask if she wanted to travel with you
你问她是否想和你一起旅行吗
Yes she said she wanted to travel with you
是的她说她想和你一起旅行
I didn't ask if he wanted to follow with you
我没问他是否想和你一起跟着
She wanted to go to Africa with you
她想和你一起去非洲
I asked what she wanted to include with you
我问她想和你一起包括什么
Work together
一起工作的
People who work together
一起工作的人
She and I work together
她和我一起工作
People who work together with you
和你一起工作的人
I asked if she wanted to work together
我问她是否想一起工作
Did you ask if he wanted to work together with you
你问他是否想和你一起工作吗
Yes he said he wanted to work together with you
是的他说他想和你一起工作
She didn't ask if I wanted to work together
她没问我是否想一起工作
I wanted to travel with people who work together
我想和一起工作的人旅行
Did she agree to work together with you
她同意和你一起工作吗
That person
那个人
I asked that person
我问那个人
That person wanted to travel
那个人想旅行
That person agreed with you
那个人同意你
I asked what that person wanted to include
我问那个人想包括什么
Did you ask if that person wanted to travel with you
你问那个人是否想和你一起旅行吗
Yes that person said she wanted to work together
是的那个人说她想一起工作
That person who works with you wanted to travel
和你一起工作的那个人想旅行
I asked that person who works with you
我问和你一起工作的那个人
That person you work with
和你一起工作的那个人
